div.div: Histochemical GUS staining of transgenic Arabidopsis under the control of EgFAD8 promoter.
div.p: The results from transgenic Arabidopsis: A1-A5; the untransformed Arabidopsis were used as the negative control: B1-B5. 1: three-week-old seedling; 2: leaves; 3: roots; 4: flowers and stems; 5: silique coats.
